tool.name: SpectraFilterNLargest
tool.command:
SpectraFilterNLargest
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if -threads \${GALAXY_SLOTS:-24} #if $param_algorithm_n: -algorithm:n $param_algorithm_n #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.label: The number of peaks to keep
param.name: param_algorithm_n

tool.help:
Applies thresholdfilter to peak spectra.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_SpectraFilterNLargest.html
